metadata.title: "Coyote Goes to the Sky"
metadata.author: Julia Starritt
metadata.publication: William Bright, The Karok Language (1957), pp. 190-193, Text 8

s.kar:
káan
avansáxiich
áxak
kun 'íin anik .
s.eng: Two boys once lived there.

s.kar:
xás
páy nanu'ávahkam
kúuk
kin p ôonva .
s.eng: And they were taken to the sky.

s.kar:
xás
tá
kun xús "
kíri
kun 'ípak ."
s.eng: Then (people) thought, "Let them come back!"

s.kar:
xás
vúra
hûut
chí
pa kúuk
kun kupá 'uum ah eesh .
s.eng: And how were they to get there?

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
u píip
" chími
aan
nu paríshriihvu naa ."
s.eng: Then Coyote said, "Let's twine string!"

s.kar:
xás
" koovúra
pa parishríhv aan sa "
u píip
" ôok
kii vyíhuk i ."
s.eng: And he said, "All twiners, come here!"

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
vúra
uum
sípnu kaam
t óo
thárish
pa káan
u máhyaan eesh .
s.eng: And Coyote put a big storage basket down where they were to put it in.

s.kar:
xás
káan
avansa tínihich
u kûuruthuna tih .
s.eng: And a flat man was sliding around there.

s.kar:
xás
pa 'aan tunvêech
kun 'ivit shúr oo ti
víri
vaa
u 'ífik tih .
s.eng: And when they picked off the little strings, he was picking them up.

s.kar:
xás
vaa
u parishríihvu tih .
s.eng: And he was twining that.

s.kar:
xás
pa mu sípnuuk
uum
ipshûunkinich ,
kúna
vúra
tinihyâach ,
káan
u 'uuchnímach .
s.eng: And his storage basket was short, but it was sort of wide, it was squatting there.

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
t óo
piip
" yée naa ,
yiivárih .
s.eng: And Coyote said, "Hey, go away!

s.kar:
iim
vúra
pu faat-hára ."
s.eng: You're just nothing!"

s.kar:
xás
vaa
vúra
koovúra
kun ikyá vunaa tih .
s.eng: And they were all twining.

s.kar:
xás
chavúra
kun píkyaar .
s.eng: And finally they finished.

s.kar:
xás
ta'ítam
kun kunih úraa na heen
pá 'aan .
s.eng: And so they shot the string up.

s.kar:
pihnêefich
u píip
" naa
píshiip
pa niní 'aan
á'
kii kuníh uraa ."
s.eng: Coyote said, "Shoot my string up first!"

s.kar:
xás
u p ikyívunih .
s.eng: But it fell back down.

s.kar:
xás
chavúra
koovúra
kun kuníh uraa .
s.eng: And finally they shot them all up.

s.kar:
xás
chavúra
pu yítha xay
sakriiv hára .
s.eng: And finally not one (stuck) fast.

s.kar:
xás
pa 'avansa tinihyâach
u píip
" chími
naa
pa niní 'aan
kii kuníh uraa ."
s.eng: Then the little flat man said, "Shoot my string up!"

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
u píip
" oo !
vúra
iim
pu faat-hára .
s.eng: And Coyote said, "Aw, you're just nothing!

s.kar:
xáyfaat
ku kuníh uraa ."
s.eng: Don't shoot it up!"

s.kar:
xás
ta'ítam
kun kuníh uraa heen .
s.eng: But then they shot it up.

s.kar:
xás
xánahich
xás
axmáy
ú traax .
s.eng: And in a little while, suddenly it struck.

s.kar:
xás
pá 'aan
u kéen .
s.eng: And the string quivered.

s.kar:
xás
kun ishripíhpih .
s.eng: And they pulled on it.

s.kar:
xás
vúra
sákriiv .
s.eng: And it was fast.

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
u 'aachíchha ,
xás
u píip
" kúnish
íp
ní pa at
pa mú 'aan
uum
káan
ú kyiim eesh ."
s.eng: And Coyote was glad, and he said, "I sort of said his string would reach there!"

s.kar:
xás
ta'ítam
kun 'iru voor úraa na heen .
s.eng: And so they crawled up.

s.kar:
xás
pa 'á'
kun ívyiihma
xás
kun píip
" kun 'íhukar ahi tih ."
s.eng: And when they got up, then they said, "They're having a flower-dance."

s.kar:
víri
pa 'avansáxiich
uum
áachip
pa kun 'íih tih .
s.eng: There were the boys dancing in the middle.

s.kar:
xás
tá
kun ímuus ti
pa 'iihvúnaa .
s.eng: And they watched the dance.

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
u píip
" chími
naa
kan 'íh i ."
s.eng: And Coyote said, "Let me dance!"

s.kar:
xás
kun ipêer
" hôoy if ,
í kfuuyshur eesh .
s.eng: And they told him, "No, you'll get tired.

s.kar:
yakún
uumkun
yúruk
ithivthaneen 'ípan
kun 'íh m oo tih ,
káru
káruk
ithivthaneen 'ípan
kun 'íh m oo tih ."
s.eng: They dance to the downriver end of the world, and they dance to the upriver end of the world."

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
u píip
" naa
vúra
vaa
ni kuph eesh .
s.eng: And Coyote said, "I can do that!

s.kar:
yâamahukach
nik ."
s.eng: It's easy!"

s.kar:
xás
káakum
vaa
káan
kun 'iruvêehriv
p oo súruruprin ahi tih irak .
s.eng: And some of them were standing where the hole was (through which they had entered the sky).

s.kar:
xás
kun píip
" pa 'avansáxiich
káan
tá
kun 'íih m ahaak
ík
kári
ku pêethkee vish ."
s.eng: And they said, "When the boys dance to there, you people must pull them out."

s.kar:
xás
kári
kun 'íih vunaa .
s.eng: Then they danced.

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
axmáy
hôoyva
u kpêehva
" shúuuuuhuuuuu ."
s.eng: And suddenly Coyote hollered somewhere, "Shuuuuuhuuuuu."

s.kar:
xás
yánava
vúra
tá
kun ithyúru tih .
s.eng: And they saw they were just dragging him.

s.kar:
xás
káan
pa 'avansáxiich
tá
kun 'íih ma
p oo súruruprin ahi tih irak .
s.eng: And the boys danced there to where the hole was.

s.kar:
ta'ítam
kun p ithyúruripa heen .
s.eng: So they pulled them out.

s.kar:
xás
ta'ítam
kun p ihmáruni heen .
s.eng: And so they ran back down (to earth).

s.kar:
púra fát aak
pihnêefich .
s.eng: Coyote was nowhere (to be seen).

s.kar:
xás
ta'ítam
kun p ithyúruni heen .
s.eng: And so they hauled (the string) back down.

s.kar:
xás
pihnêefich
u 'íipma
p oo súruruprin ahi tih irak .
s.eng: Then Coyote got back to where the hole was.

s.kar:
ník
u túraayva .
s.eng: He was looking for it.

s.kar:
yánava
vúra
pukára
káan hára .
s.eng: He saw there was nobody there.

s.kar:
xás
u píip
" oo !
tá
kan éepshaamkir .
s.eng: And he said, "Oh, they've left me!

s.kar:
víri
hûut
vúra
pa ni kupee p vûunih ah eesh ."
s.eng: How am I going to get back down?"

s.kar:
xás
u tnûuprih .
s.eng: And he looked through.

s.kar:
xás
u píip
" yee !
vúra
ník
kúnish
ûumukich .
s.eng: And he said, "Say, it's kind of close!

s.kar:
yukún
p eethívthaaneen
vúra
thúkinkunish
xás
kúnish
ûumukich .
s.eng: The earth is so green and kind of close.

s.kar:
naa
ni xú ti
' vúra
ni shkákuni heesh .'
s.eng: I think I'll jump down."

s.kar:
xás
ta'ítam
u skáaksur .
s.eng: And so he jumped off.

s.kar:
xás
p óo kyiim ti
t u kuchnáxavrin ,
xás
t óo
krírihivrin ,
xás
vúra
xára
u kyiivúur .
s.eng: And when he fell, he turned head over heels, and he rolled over sideways, and he was falling for a long time.

s.kar:
itahara hárinay
u kyiivúur .
s.eng: He fell for ten years.

s.kar:
xás
p oo kyívish
vúra
ípi
kích
káru
pa mú maan .
s.eng: And when he landed, he was just bones and his skin.

s.kar:
xás
vaa
páy
uum
pihnêefich
u kúph aanik .
s.eng: And Coyote did that.
